SmartFieldSpec.Name: Average Recurring Gift Amount Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Average amount of all recurring gifts for a constituent's active sponsorships.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SmartFieldSpec.DisplayName: Average recurring gift amount smart field
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_AVERAGERECURRINGGIFTS ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date select CONSTITUENTID, ROUND(AVG( case [FREQUENCYCODE] when 0 then (TRANSACTIONAMOUNT/12) when 1 then ((TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 2)/12) when 2 then ((TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 4)/12) when 3 then TRANSACTIONAMOUNT when 6 then ((TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 6)/12) when 7 then ((TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 24)/12) when 8 then ((TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 26)/12) when 9 then ((TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 52)/12) end),2) as TRANSACTIONAMOUNT from dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rs join dbo.financialtransaction ft on ft.id = rs.id where TYPECODE = 2 --recurring gift and STATUSCODE IN (0,1) --active, held -- Only include recurring gifts associated with active sponsorships and rs.ID in (select REVENUE.ID from dbo.REVENUE join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on REVENUE.ID = rs.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP on SPONSORSHIP.REVENUESPLITID = rs.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT on CONSTITUENT.ID = SPONSORSHIP.CONSTITUENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY on SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD on SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD.ID = SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID where SPONSORSHIP.STATUSCODE = 1) group by CONSTITUENTID
